body: Something's gone bad in the kitchen. Foul beer, bad fish, spoiled stew—whatever the cause is, it's making the customers sick. You can avoid any negative repercussions by spending 1d2 points of Magic on potions or medicinal elixirs or succeeding at a DC 20 Heal check. Otherwise, bad word of mouth costs you 2d6 points of Influence, and for the next 2d6 days the building takes a —5 penalty on checks to generate capital.
name: Taproom Trouble
